Articles.Content:
Hey everyone, i never really used any mods that enhance graphics so i really have no idea what to look for.

Can you offer some suggestions with mods that at least work with 1.4.5, i am guessing most of them will work with 1.5 as well!

Thank you!
If you've never used mods I recommend getting CKAN and scrolling through the lists.  Since you've not used mods before it will handle the installing and prevent conflicting mods.
I was asking about visual mods since i dont know much about that part of the modding community.I am familiar with mods in general just not in that area.
Ah, well, start with EVE - Environmental Visual Enhancements and SVE - Stock Visual Enhancements.

Environmental Visual Enhancements and Scatterer are both working with the new release.  The difference is truly amazing.

Edited October 27, 2018 by Klapaucius
Great, thanks for the pointers  , i ll give them a try!
He's right.  You'll become a vis-snob, but remember Stock is a beautiful creation.
